description: This table contains extracts of audit information for alert snooze.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SNOOZE_SPR_HX_YN
columns.description:
Audit item for history of this flag


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: SNOOZE_HX_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the audit information for source of change in the snooze setting.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Automatic on creation


PEF Manager


System Cleanup


Episode Resolved

columns.name: SNOOZE_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the audit information about which user changed the snooze setting.

columns.name: SNOOZE_HX_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores audit information about the instant when the snooze setting was changed.
